Member Function Documentation

int NavExternalAuth::handleExternalAuth (  NavRequestData &  rd,
bool &  reusedConnection,
MC2String &  externalAuthName
) 
 

Handles auth of a packet.

Parameters:
rd The holder of the request data.
reusedConnection Set to true if reused connection.
externalAuthName Set to the name of the external auth.
Returns:
0 if auth is ok, -1 if not ok and reply's status is set, -2 if to try normal auth after this.

int NavExternalAuth::handleHttpHeaderRequest (  NavRequestData &  rd,
bool &  reusedConnection,
const ParserExternalAuthHttpSettings *  settings
)  [private]
 

Handle a request using http-header to identify user and limit access to a number of IP-series.

Parameters:
rd The holder of the request data.
reusedConnection Set to true if reused connection.
settings The settings to use.
Returns:
0 if auth is ok, -1 if not ok and reply's status is set, -2 if to try normal auth after this.

IsabBoxInterfaceRequest *  ireq
) 
 

Checks if a request is an external auth candidate.

The request to check.

Parameters:
ireq The interface request that the packet came with.

bool NavExternalAuth::isHttpRequest (  NavRequestPacket *  req  )  const [private]
 

Checks if request looks like an http authenticated user.

int NavExternalAuth::removeExternalAuthUserNames (  NParamBlock &  params  )  const
 

Removes external-auth reserved user names from parameter block.

Parameters:
params Where to remove reserved usernames from.
Returns:
0 if ok, -1 if error and -2 if timeout.
